name: Wanisinowin | Lost
description:
Created as a part of the first Indigicade, a workshop that teaches indigenous women how to make games. Presented at ImagineNATIVE 2015. 
Indigicade was created in partnership between  Indigenous Routes and Dames Making Games.  

Play as Wani, a young girl living in the spirit world who learns that she is, in fact, human. She is given a chance to go with her Aunt to the human world but the road there is not an easy one. Players need to navigate a dark world without losing their light or their way.

CONTROLS
WASD or Arrow Keys to move
SPACE to jump
